title: Trudeau's Failed Canadian-Chinese Joint Covid-19 Vaccine Venture
cleaned_text:
In 2020, Justin Trudeau pursued a joint-venture between the Canadian government and a Chinese firm to produce a supposed “made-in-Canada” COVID-19 vaccine. But Trudeau concealed the fact his partnership was ostensibly with the Chinese military. What unfolded was a drama that included corporate theft, political deception, and international espionage.

This story also gives viewers a look behind the scenes of the vast Gates-funded and WHO, CEPI and GAVI-led international vaccine cartel racket.

Why did Trudeau pursue this doomed deal and ultimately waste millions in public money, despite warnings from Canada’s intelligence officials about China, where the CCP was holding two Canadian citizens as prisoners?

The Fifth Estate investigates how Trudeau’s controversial deal eventually fell apart – without a single dose ever being administered to Canadians. Watch:
